question: What is STATegra?
ideal_answer: STATegra is a comprehensive multi-omics dataset of B-cell differentiation in mouse. It includes measurements from up to 10 different omics technologies applied to the same biological system, namely the well-studied mouse pre-B-cell differentiation.

snippets.text: STATegra, a comprehensive multi-omics dataset of B-cell differentiation in mouse.

Here we present the STATegra multi-omics dataset that combines measurements from up to 10 different omics technologies applied to the same biological system, namely the well-studied mouse pre-B-cell differentiation. STATegra includes high-throughput measurements of chromatin structure, gene expression, proteomics and metabolomics, and it is complemented with single-cell data. To our knowledge, the STATegra collection is the most diverse multi-omics dataset describing a dynamic biological system.
